ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit

Class KeywordMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.KeywordMap

  • public final class KeywordMap
extends Object
    Maps keywords to token types. This class is designed to be used by a Tokenizer to perform quick keyword matching directly from a potential match stored in a text segment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeywordMap(boolean ignoreCase)
      Creates a new, empty keyword map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(String keyword, TokenType type)
      Adds a keyword mapping.
      TokenType get(Segment text, int offset, int length)
      Returns the token type for a key stored in a text segment.
      TokenType get(String text)
      Returns the token type for a keyword string, or null if the map does not contain the key.
      Set<String> getKeySet()
      Returns an unmodifiable set of all of the keywords stored in the map.
      boolean isCaseSensitive()
      Returns true if this keyword map is case sensitive.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeywordMap

        public KeywordMap(boolean ignoreCase)
        Creates a new, empty keyword map.
        Parameters:
        ignoreCase - if true, key matching will be case insensitive

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(String keyword,
                TokenType type)
        Adds a keyword mapping. Keywords cannot be empty.
        Parameters:
        keyword - the keyword to add
        type - the token type that the keyword maps to

      • get

        public TokenType get(Segment text,
                     int offset,
                     int length)
        Returns the token type for a key stored in a text segment.
        Parameters:
        text - the text segment
        offset - the offset of the substring within the text segment
        length - the length of the substring

      • get

        public TokenType get(String text)
        Returns the token type for a keyword string, or null if the map does not contain the key.
        Parameters:
        text - the keyword to look up
        Returns:
        the token type for the keyword, or null

      • getKeySet

        public Set<String> getKeySet()
        Returns an unmodifiable set of all of the keywords stored in the map.
        Returns:
        a set of the keywords in this map

      • isCaseSensitive

        public boolean isCaseSensitive()
        Returns true if this keyword map is case sensitive.
        Returns:
        true if keyword matching is case sensitive
